7.ara-name: كتاب الزكاة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdur-Rahman bin Bujaid narrated from his grandmother; :Umm Bujaid - and she was one of those who gave the pledge to the Prophet - she said to the Messenger of Allah: "There is a needy person who stands outside my door, but I cannot find anything to give to him." So the Messenger of Allah said to her: "If you do not find anything to give him except a burnt trotter then hand it over to him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حَقِّ السَّائِلِ
chapter.eng-name: , What Has Been Related About The Right Of The One Asking
